keyMoments.title: Luffy Directly Engages Caesar Clown
keyMoments.description: Luffy arrives and punches Caesar with a Haki-infused attack, beginning their direct confrontation.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the Straw Hats' transition from investigation to active combat against Caesar.

keyMoments.title: Revealed as Operators of SAD/SMILE Production
keyMoments.description: Caesar reveals that Doflamingo runs the SAD production that creates SMILE artificial Devil Fruits.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the Donquixote Pirates' involvement in illegal Devil Fruit manufacturing.
